title: Individualized Player-Centered Training Design for Modern Soccer Goalkeepers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Process Where Students Mathematically Validate and Train Goalkeeper Strategies Through Real Match Video Analysis and Data Modeling, Developing Personalized Training Programs Aligned with Individual Skill Levels and Team Tactical Needs

learning_goals: Students can identify and explain with mathematical models at least three physical and tactical requirements of goalkeepers through match video analysis.
Based on individual goalkeeper skill diagnostic data, students can develop personalized training plans with over 80% accuracy.
Through PBL team projects, students can develop goalkeeper coaching simulation tools and apply them to real training scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
